p.d: A young woman is found dead. Though it appears to be a crime of passion, the manager of a neighbouring gîte confesses to the murder. However, the motive and the proof just don't match up. Directed by: Christophe Douchand (season 1, France, 2016) Screenplay: Sophie Baren, Denis Alamercery Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Nelly Lawson (Camille), François Dominique Blin (Franck Marvaud), Sarah-Cheyenne (Alice), Titouan Laporte (Thomas), Renaud Leymans (Éric Vernet) Genre: detective
